currentProject.quote: Jordan and I co-led our Full-Stack Development Apprenticeship for several years. He picked up the programming section after a team member moved on. Jordan redesigned the curriculum; our apprentices went from haphazard lectures and a college-style syllabus to defined, project-based learning with established goals and outcomes. He organized other members of the development team to teach lessons. He even created a template repository to provide an entry point for very junior developers to build new applications on their own. He's an accomplished mentor and efficient problem-solver. <mark>He makes people better just by working with them.</mark>
